Hydras:

Hydras hissed and said "Keep working. Tell me when the repairs are done"

-----Original Message----- 
From: Super Cyclonus 
Sent: Friday, July 01, 2011 7:04 AM 
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Subject: Re: Hydras and Predacons 

> <OLD>
>
> "Tell me about the internal and externals defenses"hissed Hydras

<NEW>

CYCLONUS looked at HYDRAS curiously for a moment and then nodded. "The
external defenses consist of several laser blasts cannons as well as a
full strength force shields. We even have a proton torpedo launcher.
Internally we have forcshields, cameras to watch the ship as well as
small laser cannons that can be oriented to target intruders. We have
stassiss field generators to render troops inoperative."

There was a pause from CYCLONUS as he watched his commander, his
normally cool expression one of curiousity and interest.

OOC: Stassis field generator = Cybertronian version of knock out gas

(TAG)

Preston
